case_title: MUHAMMAD INAYAT vs MANZOOR AHMED DHUDRA, ADVOCATE, GUJRAT

complaint_details.allegations: Illegal gratification of Rs. 4 lacs demanded by respondent for acquittal of accused in a murder case.
complaint_details.special_oath: Complainant and witness took special oath confirming payment of Rs. 3,70,000.

respondent_defense.denial: Allegations denied as false and frivolous.
respondent_defense.political_rivalry: Claimed complaint was politically motivated by Ch. Pervaiz Elahi.
respondent_defense.other_defenses: Contradictions in complainant's statements and amount discrepancies.

tribunal_findings.misconduct: Respondent found guilty of professional misconduct.
tribunal_findings.special_oath: Respondent resiled from his offer after special oath was taken.

order.notification: Punjab Bar Council directed to remove respondent's name from advocate roll and notify relevant authorities.
order.recovery_remedy: Complainant advised to seek civil and criminal remedies for recovery of amount.
